data.comment: Erik Lambrechts starts the match. Gent with the kick-off in Bruges.
Roman Bezus is replacing Vadis Odjidja for the away team.
In the minute 26, Milad Mohammadi (Gent) gets a yellow card.
The second-half is underway. Brugge with the kick-off.
In the minute 47, Brugge's Hans Vanaken has been booked in Bruges.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a first substitution, with Noa Lang replacing David Okereke.
Simon Deli (Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 64, Niklas Dorsch is booked for the away team.
Federico Ricca scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 0-1 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The home team replace Ruud Vormer with Mats Rits.
In the minute 78, Gent make their second substitution with Tim Kleindienst replacing Osman Bukari.
Noa Lang (Brugge) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
That's full-time at Jan Breydel Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
The away team have replaced Alessio Castro-Montes with Igor Plastun. This is the third substitution made today by Hein van Haezebrouck.
Youssouph Badji is on a sub for Clinton Mata for Brugge.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Tim Kleindienst has been yellow-carded for the away team.
